mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{cate_code}, #{top_cate}, #{name}, #{comt}, now(), #{reg_id}, now(), #{up_id});
mapper.select: SELECT cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id FROM category
SELECT cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id FROM category WHERE top_cate = '0'
SELECT cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id FROM category WHERE top_cate = #{top_cate}
SELECT cate_code, top_cate, name, comt, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id FROM category WHERE cate_code = #{cate_code}
